definitions.definition: Of or pertaining to multiple distinct academic disciplines or fields of study .
examples: This journal is interdisciplinary : it has articles on everything from biology to electrical engineering.

definitions.definition: Of or pertaining to a linkage between multiple distinct academic disciplines or fields of study .
examples: The interdisciplinary co-operation at this university is very impressive.

main_definition: Of or pertaining to multiple distinct academic disciplines or fields of study .
secondary_definitions: Of or pertaining to a linkage between multiple distinct academic disciplines or fields of study .
